---
title: Clustering and differential expression analysis of PBMC2 using COTAN
---


```{r}
library(COTAN)
library(Seurat)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
library(zeallot)
options(parallelly.fork.enable = TRUE)
source("../../libraries/utils.R")

NAME = 'PBMC2'
DATASETS_FOLDER = '../../dataset/'

inDataDir  = paste(DATASETS_FOLDER, NAME, sep='')
outDir = paste(DATASETS_FOLDER, NAME, '-Filtered/', sep='')
dir.create(outDir, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)

setLoggingLevel(2)
setLoggingFile(file.path(outDir, "PBMC2_analysis.log"))
```

Data loading

```{r}
PBMC2 <- readRDS(file = file.path(outDir, paste0(NAME, ".cotan.RDS")))
```

```{r}
PBMC2 <- proceedToCoex(

)
```


Clustering

```{r}
c(splitClusters, splitCoexDF) %<-%
  cellsUniformClustering(
    PBMC2,
    GDIThreshold = 1.6,
    cores = 13,
    saveObj = TRUE,
    outDir = outDir
  )

PBMC2 <- addClusterization(
  PBMC2,
  clName = "split",
  clusters = splitClusters,
  coexDF = splitCoexDF,
  override = TRUE
)

splitClusters <- getClusterizationData(PBMC2, clName = "split")[[1]]
table(splitClusters)
```


```{r}
saveRDS(PBMC2, file = file.path(outDir, paste0(NAME, ".cotan.RDS")))
```

Save the clustering result

```{r}
final_clusters = splitClusters # or mergedClusters
final_clusters_name = "split" # or merge

saveRDS(PBMC2, file = file.path(outDir, paste0(NAME, ".cotan.RDS")))
cluster = as.data.frame(final_clusters)
colnames(cluster)[colnames(cluster) == deparse(substitute(final_clusters))] <- "cluster"
cluster$cluster = match(cluster$cluster, levels(final_clusters))
cluster$cell = rownames(cluster)
rownames(cluster) = c(1:nrow(cluster))
write_clustering(outDir, cluster, "cell", "cluster")
```

Differential expression

```{r}
coexDF %<-% DEAOnClusters(PBMC2, clusters = final_clusters) # pvals?
PBMC2 <- addClusterizationCoex(PBMC2, clName = final_clusters_name,
                             coexDF = coexDF)
```

Save markers

```{r}
write_COTAN_markers = function(OUT_RES_DIR, clusters, pValues, TOP_MARKER_NUM) {
    markers = data.frame()

    for (cluster_id in (levels(clusters))) {
        cluster_markers = data.frame()
        pv = pValues[, cluster_id]
        names(pv) = rownames(pValues)
        sorted_pv = sort(pv, decreasing = FALSE)
        cluster_markers = data.frame(gene = names(sorted_pv)[1:TOP_MARKER_NUM],
                                    cluster = match(cluster_id, levels(clusters)),
                                    rank = 1:TOP_MARKER_NUM)

        markers = rbind(markers, cluster_markers)
    }
    colnames(markers) = c("gene","cluster","rank")

    write.csv(markers, paste(OUT_RES_DIR, "/markers.csv", sep=""), row.names = FALSE)
}

TOP_MARKER_NUM = 500
write_COTAN_markers(outDir, final_clusters, coexDF, TOP_MARKER_NUM)
```
